timeline.author: mikehardy

timeline.bodyText: I believe this onCollectionLoaded callback is async yes? (I should know offhand but always have to re-trace this stuff and I'm reviewing quickly at the moment) I believe it is - if this is on the main/UI thread it could be a pain for folks, we try not to touch storage ever on the main/UI thread, thus all the AsyncTask infrastructure
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText:
We already do it in both the unchanged lines above and below, this adds two more calls. onCollectionLoaded is a very rare event, so I'm not too worried about adding a few ms here.
But, I'll move this into a testable unit, and will get it fixed. Probably in the next day or two. Happy to block on this for now.

timeline.message:
#5065 - Persist Whiteboard Visible State

Previously, the whiteboard visible state depended on the enabled state

This caused problems when switching from Night Mode.

Now, the preferences are separate, with visible depending on the status
of enabled.
